text: The New Orleans Privateers college sports teams for the University of New Orleans (UNO). They play in the NCAA Division I for intercollegiate athletics. The schools teams are a part of the Sun Belt Conference. The University of New Orleans does not currently have a football team. ==Sports== The university has teams in the following sports: * Baseball (Men's) * Basketball (Men's and women's teams) * Golf (Men's) * Swimming and diving * Tennis (Men's and women's teams) * Volleyball (Women's) The school did have a football team from 1965 until 1970. During that time, the team had a record of 12 wins, 10 losses and 1 tie. They also won 3 district championships. ==Other websites== * UNOPrivateers.com (Official website) Category:Sports in New Orleans Category:Colleges and universities in Louisiana
title: New Orleans Privateers
